Not to worry, our system automatically cleans up the cache when it reaches 50MB ~ 100MB. Do you clear wish to clear it?
To prevent losing your chats, data and important records, we have disabled deleting app database. You can do it manually from your phone setting if you still insist.

Last seen, alert, calls, comm. & block user.
Alert, community, calls, p2p notify & game.
Setup payment account, register as P2P Merchant.

Note: 
1. The stake amount will be deducted from your wallet and other players who joined. 
2. The staking funds will be moved to 'Locked Asset'. Which means you can't access the fund till the end of the game. 
3. The total stake funds will be credited to the winner's wallet immediately the game ends.
will be transferred from your Game Asset to your Lock Asset, where it will be held until the game is over.
You have on going game already
Allow minimum of two (2) joined player!
Add Orange Tick to your Community
PS: You can select more than one.
Your details are secured and encrypted.
This is used for your P2P trading once you are verified (KYC).
For privacy, your number is automatically hidden from non-contacts. You can choose to make it public via setting after login. We value your privacy 😊.

You won\'t be able to see other people last seen and online status if you set it at "nobody", unless you are a Premium user.
You won\'t know when other people read your alert(chats) if you turn off read receipt unless you are a Premium user.

Hey there! I\'m inviting you to join TopStar, an app where we can chat, play various live stream multiplayer games, and earn rewards together.\nwww.topstar.com.ng

Switch to video call mood first
Subscribe to Premium to enjoy high features

No player found. Quit and restart game
Go to setting and grant storage/camera permission
Go to setting and grant camera | record permission
Too many attempt. try again later!
Access to this account has been temporarily disabled due to many failed password attempts. Try again in one hour time.

1. On pin complexion, if device supports fingerprint (biometric), it will be enabled automatically. 
2. This is to enable you have access to your wallet quickly, and also prevent other party from seeing your PIN when typing it. 
3. If you don't need the fingerprint, you can disable it via app settings to continue using only PIN.
4. TopStar Team will never ask you for your PIN. Never disclose your PIN to anyone. Protect your funds!
I have read and agreed the terms below.
This pin is used for opening your wallet and processing transactions only. Hence, it should be different from your login password.
Never disclose your pin/password to anyone, or to anyone claiming to be topstar customer care/support. We will never ask you for your pin details. Protect your funds by all means!
3. Minimum of $500 (or its equivalent in your local currency) into your P2P Trading account.
Add a bank account you want to receive payment to. We recommend banks with good network for smooth transactions between peers.
Receive funds via your usdt address instantly
Interact with a verified TopStar user to fund your wallet via bank transaction
Withdraw directly to your bank account via p2p
Withdraw fund directly to any usdt address
Link your phone number to enjoy seamless high features
Enter code sent to the new email address
Enter code sent to the new phone number
Display name must be greater than four (4)
Field must be greater than four (4)
Username must be greater than three (3) length
Another user is already using this number.
Note: when transferring funds from your local currency to an international user, it will be converted to and sent as "USDT".
Please choose the correct network for the address provided. We can\'t recover fund sent to a wrong network.
If you send less than the minimum amount, the fund will be lost.
Please send to the exact network you selected. We can\'t recover fund sent to a wrong network.
If trader charges you beyond their stated fee, kindly report such user immediately.
Failure to comply to TopStar terms and trader remark below may result in lost. Click to accept.
If payment is not made to trader\'s account within 20 minutes after you proceed, the order will be cancelled automatically.

1. If you do not release fund after receiving payment from trader, the system will reach out to you first. And if no response from you within 6 hours of reaching out to you, the system will automatically release fund to trader. Stay active! 
2. In a situation of network issue, ensure you relate it with the trader. 
3. If trader files a report again you about complete payment with evidence, and you claimed not to have received payment, Verified TopStar Support will reach out to you for evidence or bank statement, and if no response from you within 6 hours, funds will be automatically released. 
4. If there's response from you within the 6 hours time frame, your fund will remain intact but locked, till all verification and proof of evidence between you and trader are be carried out and resolved by TopStar Team.
Trader asset for the order amount has been locked. You can go ahead with payment within the above time frame!
If trader\'s real name above doesn\'t match with the payment name, don\'t release the fund yet until you have reached out to TopStar Support. Protect your account!
Tick the box if you have confirmed payment.
Tick the box if you have read and agreed to terms.
Please hide your PIN from everyone.
Ensure you received the fund in your bank account or wallet first before you click \"Release Now\".

If you don\'t click \"I have paid\" button before the time ends, the order will be closed automatically by the system. And ensure you complete payment within the time frame before clicking \"I have paid\" button.
Awaiting trader to release fund in:
A request has been sent to trader to check your payment. If trader does not release fund within the time frame, alert him/her. If no respond, make a report!
Ndifreke Sunday will send 50,000 NGN to your:
This is different from your transaction pin.
Please ensure all details are correct before entering PIN.
I acknowledge I have sent the exact amount to trader.
I acknowledge I have checked my bank account or e-wallet and confirmed trader/payer has made complete payment to my account.
I acknowledge the trader/payer legal name display on P2P TopStar app is same as the payment name.
Order marked! \nTrader/payer has claimed to make payment. Kindly check your account for confirmation and click on \"Release Now\" if seen.

1. If you have made payment already, please do not cancel this order, because we can\'t recover the fund back. \n2. If you cancel order twice in a day, the system will automatically stop you from performing any p2p transaction in 24hours.
I didn\'t meet the trader\'s requirements.
Trader is requesting for extra fee.
Trader\'s account name is different from his/her legal name.
State detail reason you are cancelling.
Is it mandatory for players to join your preferred community first before they can join your League?
In case of paid fee entry, reward must be at least 2x greater than the entry fee
Be a part of this tournament

1. If reward or entry fee is involved, the funds will be moved to your "Lock Asset" wallet. Meaning you can't have access or withdraw the funds until the end of the league / tournament. 
2. Rewards will be sent to the winner in 1 hour time after the end of the league. While the entry fees are moved from your "Lock Asset" to "USDT Asset". 
3. If you have any complain on rewarding the winner, please reach out to support within the escalated time frame. 
4. Reward already sent to winner can't be recovered back especially if the winner has moved the funds out of the platform. 
5. In a situation you cancel the league and entry fee is involved, the system will automatically refund the entry fee to each user wallet. 
6. If you cancel league more than 3 times within 30 days, the system will automatically block you from create any league in 40 days. 
7. You can not cancel any on going league. If you have strong reason to cancel it, kindly reach out to support for assistance.
